definitions.definition: A weight training implement consisting of a short bar with weight counterpoised on each end.
examples: He was exercising with the dumbbells in gym class today.

definitions.definition: A bell with no clapper , used as bell-striking practice or to strike as a form of physical exercise

main_definition: A weight training implement consisting of a short bar with weight counterpoised on each end.
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) A bell with no clapper , used as bell-striking practice or to strike as a form of physical exercise
